name: River Flow
description:
The world is a 2D plane, limited in size, winding river crosses the map. The map contains trees, stones and goods.

The player spawns on a raft at the beginning of a river, the raft moves slowly down the river.

The player's task is to complete all the missions and have time to return to the raft.

The player interacts with the world by breaking rocks and trees, picking up goods.
